Actions.Text: REFERRED TO CONSUMER AFFAIRS AND PROTECTION

Title: Relates to rights of car wash facility customers to file a complaint regarding damages sustained from such car wash facility
Summary: Requires certain car wash facilities to display a notice to customers that such customers may file a complaint regarding damages sustained from such car wash facility to the consumer protection division.
LawCode: Add ยง349-h, Gen Bus L
ActClause: AN ACT to amend the general business law, in relation to rights of car wash facility customers to file a complaint regarding damages sustained from such car wash facility
